item.title: Bridgecrew Setup
item.description: You’ll need to sign up for a free Bridgecrew account to follow along with this tutorial. You can sign up for a free account here. Bridgecrew CLI In this tutorial, we’re also going to use Bridgecrew CLI. The CLI works on Windows, Mac, and Linux.
